description:
After defeating Hordy, Luffy turns his attention to stopping the Noah from crushing Fish-Man Island. Straw Hats and Fish-Men alike watch as Luffy tries to obliterate a boat with a barrage of brutal blows!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arrêter Noah. Dernier espoir : l’Elephant Rafale !
Tomare Noah! Kesshi no Elephant Gatling!
止まれノア! 決死の象銃乱打[エレファントガトリング]!
